member.name: T:Memory.Mem
member.summary: Memory.dll class. Full documentation at https://github.com/erfg12/memory.dll/wiki

member.name: F:Memory.Mem.pHandle
member.summary: The process handle that was opened. (Use OpenProcess function to populate this variable)

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.FreezeValue(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Freeze a value to an address.
member.param: Your address
byte, 2bytes, bytes, float, int, string, double or long.
Value to freeze
ini file to read address from (OPTIONAL)

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.UnfreezeValue(System.String)
member.summary: Unfreeze a frozen value at an address
member.param: address where frozen value is stored

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.OpenProcess(System.Int32)
member.summary: Open the PC game process with all security and access rights.
member.param: Use process name or process ID here.

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.OpenProcess(System.String)
member.summary: Open the PC game process with all security and access rights.
member.param: Use process name or process ID here.

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.IsAdmin
member.summary: Check if program is running with administrative privileges. Read about it here: https://github.com/erfg12/memory.dll/wiki/Administrative-Privileges

member.name: F:Memory.Mem._is64Bit
member.summary: Check if opened process is 64bit. Used primarily for getCode().

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.GetModules
member.summary: Builds the process modules dictionary (names with addresses).

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.GetProcIdFromName(System.String)
member.summary: Get the process ID number by process name.
member.param: Example: "eqgame". Use task manager to find the name. Do not include .exe

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.LoadCode(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get code from ini file.
member.param: label for address or code
path and name of ini file

member.name: F:Memory.Mem.modules
member.summary: Dictionary with our opened process module names with addresses.

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.ThreadStartClient(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Make a named pipe (if not already made) and call to a remote function.
member.param: remote function to call
name of the thread

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.CutString(System.String)
member.summary: Cut a string that goes on for too long or one that is possibly merged with another string.
member.param: The string you want to cut.

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.SanitizeString(System.String)
member.summary: Clean up a string that has bad characters in it.
member.param: The string you want to sanitize.

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.ReadBytes(System.String,System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Reads up to `length ` bytes from an address.
member.param: address, module + pointer + offset, module + offset OR label in .ini file.
The maximum bytes to read.
path and name of ini file.

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.ReadFloat(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Read a float value from an address.
member.param: address, module + pointer + offset, module + offset OR label in .ini file.
path and name of ini file. (OPTIONAL)
Round the value to 2 decimal places

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.ReadString(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Read a string value from an address.
member.param: address, module + pointer + offset, module + offset OR label in .ini file.
path and name of ini file. (OPTIONAL)
length of bytes to read (OPTIONAL)
terminate string at null char

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.ReadDouble(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Read a double value
member.param: address, module + pointer + offset, module + offset OR label in .ini file.
path and name of ini file. (OPTIONAL)
Round the value to 2 decimal places

member.summary: Read an integer from an address.
member.param: address, module + pointer + offset, module + offset OR label in .ini file.
path and name of ini file. (OPTIONAL)

path and name of ini file. (OPTIONAL)

path and name of ini file. (OPTIONAL)

member.summary: Reads a 2 byte value from an address and moves the address.

Quantity to move.

member.summary: Reads an integer value from address and moves the address.

Quantity to move.
path and name of ini file (OPTIONAL)

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.ReadUIntMove(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Get UInt and move to another address by moveQty. Use in a for loop.
member.param: address, module + pointer + offset, module + offset OR label in .ini file.
Quantity to move.
path and name of ini file (OPTIONAL)

member.summary: Read a 2 byte value from an address. Returns an integer.

path and file name to ini file. (OPTIONAL)

path and file name of ini file. (OPTIONAL)

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.ReadBits(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Reads a byte from memory and splits it into bits
member.param: address, module + pointer + offset, module + offset OR label in .ini file.
path and file name of ini file. (OPTIONAL)
member.returns: Array of 8 booleans representing each bit of the byte read

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.WriteMemory(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Write to memory address. See https://github.com/erfg12/memory.dll/wiki/writeMemory() for more information.
member.param: address, module + pointer + offset, module + offset OR label in .ini file.
byte, 2bytes, bytes, float, int, string, double or long.
value to write to address.
path and name of .ini file (OPTIONAL)
System.Text.Encoding.UTF8 (DEFAULT). Other options: ascii, unicode, utf32, utf7

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.WriteMove(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Write to address and move by moveQty. Good for byte arrays. See https://github.com/erfg12/memory.dll/wiki/Writing-a-Byte-Array for more information.
member.param: address, module + pointer + offset, module + offset OR label in .ini file.
byte, bytes, float, int, string or long.
byte to write
quantity to move
path and name of .ini file (OPTIONAL)

member.summary: Write byte array to addresses.
member.param: address to write to
byte array to write
path and name of ini file. (OPTIONAL)

member.summary: Takes an array of 8 booleans and writes to a single byte
member.param: address to write to
Array of 8 booleans to write
path and name of ini file. (OPTIONAL)

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.WriteBytes(System.UIntPtr,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Write byte array to address

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.GetCode(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert code from string to real address. If path is not blank, will pull from ini file.
member.param: label in ini file or code
path to ini file (OPTIONAL)
size of address (default is 8)

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.Get64BitCode(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert code from string to real address. If path is not blank, will pull from ini file.
member.param: label in ini file OR code
path to ini file (OPTIONAL)
size of address (default is 16)

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.CloseProcess
member.summary: Close the process when finished.

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.InjectDll(System.String)
member.summary: Inject a DLL file.
member.param: path and name of DLL file.

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.CreateCodeCave(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a code cave to write custom opcodes in target process
member.param: Address to create the trampoline
The opcodes to write in the code cave
The number of bytes being replaced
size of the allocated region
ini file to look in
member.remarks: Please ensure that you use the proper replaceCount if you replace halfway in an instruction you may cause bad things
member.returns: UIntPtr to created code cave for use for later deallocation

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.ByteArrayToHexString(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Convert a byte array to hex values in a string.
member.param: your byte array to convert

member.name: M:Memory.Mem.DumpMemory(System.String)
member.summary: Dump memory page by page to a dump.dmp file. Can be used with Cheat Engine.
